title: Organic Tea Estate with Bungalow Cottage Close to Galle
details: Very rare opportunity to find such an attractive 60 acre estate so close to Galle. The property offers river frontage, hilltop views, its very own small lake and some breathtaking areas with ancient banyan trees that have grown over large boulders. In addition there is a wonderful cottage on the site plus other out buildings. This is the idea “retreat in the hills” surrounded by tea and other crops.
